cause.description:
Please watch the video below. It's an advertisement for the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation Walk, and the boy in the video is my nephew.
http://youtube.com/watch?v=rOkM_IgcC2k
1. There is a cure for Juvenile Diabetes.
2. This issue has been belittled for too long, and now it's time for people to take it more seriously.
3. No Child's life should be ended prematurely due to Juvenile Diabetes.
cause.mission: To raise money for Diabetes Research
cause.name: The fight against Juvenile Diabetes
